aviso_legal.title: Legal Notice
aviso_legal.meta_desc: Legal notice of PC FUTSAL. Information about the owner, website purpose, intellectual property and responsibilities.
aviso_legal.section1_address: Address: C/ Antonio Moya Albadalejo nÂº13 bajo, 03204, Elche (Alicante), Spain
aviso_legal.section1_acceptance: Access and use of the pcfutsal.es website attributes the status of user and implies full acceptance of this Legal Notice.
aviso_legal.section2_intro: The PC FUTSAL project is a platform developed by RUMAZA SYSTEMS S.L. whose purpose is:
aviso_legal.section2_item1: Display public information about results, standings and sports data.
aviso_legal.section2_item2: Generate statistics, visualizations and analytical content.
aviso_legal.section2_item3: Create entertainment games such as "fantasy futsal" based on public data.
aviso_legal.section2_item4: Produce rankings, player cards and informative sports content.
aviso_legal.section2_footer: The pcfutsal.es site is not official nor is it linked to any sports federation, and uses exclusively public information available from official sources.
aviso_legal.section3_intro: PC FUTSAL collects exclusively public sports information from:
aviso_legal.section3_item2: Pages with results, standings and public data about matches and players.
aviso_legal.section3_purpose: Scraping is performed only for informational, statistical and recreational purposes, including visualizations, rankings, "FIFA"-style cards and fantasy games.
aviso_legal.section3_no_commercial: We do not use data for commercial purposes, advertising segmentation or creation of personal profiles with legal effect.
aviso_legal.section4_item1: All proprietary content (design, visualizations, texts, code, graphics, rankings, logos and created materials) belongs to RUMAZA SYSTEMS S.L.
aviso_legal.section4_item2: Public data extracted belongs to their respective official sources.
aviso_legal.section4_item3: Reproduction, distribution or modification of content without prior authorization is prohibited.
aviso_legal.section5_item1: Make appropriate and lawful use of the site.
aviso_legal.section5_item2: Not perform activities that affect the operation of the website.
aviso_legal.section5_item3: Not manipulate or extract content in bulk.
aviso_legal.section6_text: PC FUTSAL may include links to third-party websites. RUMAZA SYSTEMS S.L. is not responsible for the content or operation of such websites.
aviso_legal.section7_text: Personal data processing is detailed in the
aviso_legal.section8_text: This site is governed by Spanish legislation. The parties waive any other jurisdiction and submit their disputes to the Courts and Tribunals of Elche (Alicante).

privacidad.title: Privacy Policy
privacidad.meta_desc: Privacy policy of PC FUTSAL. Information about personal data processing according to GDPR and LOPDGDD.
privacidad.intro: In compliance with GDPR (EU Regulation 2016/679) and LOPDGDD, the following is informed:
privacidad.section1_address: Address: C/ Antonio Moya Albadalejo nÂº13 bajo, 03204, Elche (Alicante)
privacidad.section2_voluntary_item3: Information sent through forms or registration (if any)
privacidad.section2_scraping_item4: Player data published by federations (no sensitive data)
privacidad.section2_never: We never collect private data not officially published.
privacidad.section3_item1: Manage inquiries sent through the site
privacidad.section3_item2: Improve the technical operation of the platform
privacidad.section3_item5: Generate recreational content (fantasy, rankings, visual data)
privacidad.section3_footer: Public sports data is not associated with users nor used for segmentation or advertising.
privacidad.section4_item2: Legitimate interest for technical and analytical management of the site
privacidad.section5_text: Personal data is not transferred to third parties except legal obligation. Technology providers (hosting, analytics) operate as processors with regulated contract.
privacidad.section6_item1: Data sent by user: until deletion is requested.
privacidad.section6_item2: Technical data: according to cookie configuration.
privacidad.section6_item3: Scraping data: may be kept indefinitely for statistical and informational purposes.
privacidad.section7_intro: You can exercise your rights of:
privacidad.section7_aepd: If you wish, you can file a complaint with the AEPD.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.meta_desc: Cookie policy of PC FUTSAL. Information about the use of technical and analytical cookies on the site.
cookies.intro: PC FUTSAL uses own and third-party cookies for proper technical operation and to analyze site usage.
cookies.section1_technical_text: They ensure the site's operation and do not require consent.
cookies.section1_analytical_text: They allow knowing how the website is used. We use anonymized analysis cookies (Google Analytics or equivalents).
cookies.section1_personalization_text: They allow remembering preferences such as language or visual settings.
cookies.section1_no_ads: We do not use advertising or segmentation cookies.
cookies.section2_text: You can accept or reject analytical cookies from the initial banner or from your browser settings.

contacto.title: Contact
contacto.subtitle: (or how to send us a message without having to shout from the stands)
contacto.meta_desc: Contact PC FUTSAL. Contact information, email and company details for queries, suggestions and collaborations.
contacto.intro: If you've come to this page it's because:

reasons.reclamar: you want to claim your profile,
reasons.valorar: you want to help rate players,
reasons.fotos: you want to contribute photos to improve FIFA cards,
reasons.corregir: you want to correct scorer data,
reasons.colaborar: you want to collaborate on the biggest amateur futsal project in the country,
reasons.intensidad: or you simply want to tell us that your intensity average should be 94.

contacto.descripcion: At PC FUTSAL we are building a platform made by futsal people for futsal people: players, coaches, fans, fantasy geeks and anyone who loves this sport as much as we do.
contacto.puedes_escribir: You can write to us for:

motivos.mejoras: Propose improvements, ideas or new features
motivos.errores: Report errors, incorrect data or missing results
motivos.colaborar: Collaborate as coach, player or fan
motivos.goat: Tell us who you think is the true GOAT of futsal

contacto.estamos_aqui: We're on the other side to help you.

section_email.title: Contact email
section_email.respondo: I respond as soon as possible.
section_email.prometo: I promise I don't take as long as a federation updating the standings. ðŸ˜…

section_proyecto.title: Project information
section_proyecto.descripcion: PC FUTSAL is an independent digital project that collects public data, generates FIFA-style cards, rankings, fantasy game and player/club profiles to give visibility to amateur and semi-professional futsal.
section_proyecto.footer: It's real futsal, with humor, data and a lot of passion.

section_colaborar.footer: Here we do things as a team... and without a poorly rehearsed goalkeeper-player.

home.title: What is PC FUTSAL?
home.paragraph1: PC FUTSAL is your new obsession (and we know it). We are the most complete database of amateur futsal in Spain, but with style. We are not just a simple results website: we are the place where data becomes stories, players become legends and statistics become locker room conversations.
home.paragraph2: Here you will find everything you need to know about amateur futsal: rankings updated to the second, results of every match, FIFA-style player rankings, complete profiles of clubs and players, and even a rating system that would make EA Sports algorithms cry. All updated automatically when the Federation publishes official data, because we are that efficient (and a bit data geeks).
home.paragraph3: But this is not just for viewing results. You can explore player profiles with their complete statistics, follow your favorite team's streak, discover who is the season's top scorer or simply get lost browsing through data. And if you're up for it, you'll soon be able to play fantasy, vote for the best player of the matchday and even claim your own profile if you're a player. Because here, data has personality.

clasificacion.title: About Rankings
clasificacion.paragraph1: Rankings in PC FUTSAL are not just numbers in a table: they are the living chronicle of each season. Here you'll see positions, points, goals for, goals against and that streak you love to follow (the one that makes you think 'this year we're definitely going up').
clasificacion.paragraph2: Data is automatically updated when the Federation publishes official results. No waiting, no delays: as soon as the FFCV updates their systems, we reflect those changes here. Technology at the service of futsal, basically.
clasificacion.paragraph3: In this section you can see the complete ranking of any group, filter by competition, follow your favorite team's evolution and even compare statistics between teams. All with a clean and easy-to-read design, because we believe data should be accessible, not a puzzle.

rankings.title: How Rankings Work
rankings.paragraph1: Rankings in PC FUTSAL are not generated with a calculator and good wishes. We use an advanced rating system that analyzes each player's real performance: goals, assists, cards, matches played and even the context of each match. It's like having a virtual scout that never sleeps.
rankings.paragraph2: The 'rating' is our way of measuring a player's level. It's not just a nice number: it takes into account their historical performance, current form, their impact on the team and even their consistency. A player with a high rating is not just good, they are consistently good. And that, in futsal, is worth its weight in gold (or in points, which is the same).
rankings.paragraph3: Ratings are updated after each matchday, reflecting the most recent performance. A good match can raise your rating, a bad day can lower it. It is real life, but with numbers. And yes, we know you love to see how your favorite player's rating goes up or down. We don't judge you.

club.title: Club Profile
club.paragraph1: Each club in PC FUTSAL has its own digital identity. Here you will find all relevant information: logo, municipality, venue where they play, current position in the league, results streak (the one that excites or worries you so much) and the latest matches played.
club.paragraph2: But we don't stop at the basics. You can also see the club's complete squad, with all registered players, their individual statistics and even their detailed profiles if you want to dig deeper. It's like having the match program, but improved with real-time data and without having to fold it to fit in your pocket.
club.paragraph3: This section is your starting point to learn everything about a club: its recent history, its star players, its performance in the current season and even its rating coefficient. Because in PC FUTSAL, each club tells its own story through data.

que_es_pc_futsal.meta_title: What is PC FUTSAL? â€” The Amateur Futsal Platform
que_es_pc_futsal.meta_description: PC FUTSAL is the platform where amateur futsal stops being invisible. Data, rankings, fantasy, narrative and a bit of well-understood mischief.
que_es_pc_futsal.title: What is PC FUTSAL?
que_es_pc_futsal.subtitle: The explanation a coach would give you in a sports hall at 9:45 PM, but with data.
que_es_pc_futsal.intro: PC FUTSAL is the platform where amateur futsal stops being invisible, stops depending on the cousin who uploads photos to Instagram and starts having data, rankings, fantasy, narrative and a bit of well-understood mischief.

section_real_futsal.title: It's real futsal, the usual kind:
section_real_futsal.item1: The one where the defender has been wearing tape on his knee since 2016,
section_real_futsal.item2: the winger wants everything at his feet,
section_real_futsal.item3: the pivot asks for the ball even if he's facing away from the goalkeeper,
section_real_futsal.item4: and the coach says "the goalkeeper-player thing is worked on"... but we all know it's not.
section_real_futsal.footer: But now with an extra: data, technology and free epic.

section_ecosistema.title: A complete ecosystem (yes, you read that right: ecosystem)
section_ecosistema.subtitle: PC FUTSAL is three things at the same time:

database.title: 1) The database that amateur futsal has been asking for for 20 years
database.content: Results, standings, players, history, streaks... Everything organized, clean, visual and accessible. No more searching for PDFs from three seasons ago as if it were archaeology.

fifa.title: 2) The FIFA of futsal, but without PlayStation
fifa.content: Players with FIFA-style ratings. Attributes: dribbling, intensity, attack, charisma... Profiles that look like Ultimate Team cards but based on real matches. What players always wanted to see and what coaches feared seeing.

fantasy.title: 3) Real fantasy with players from your league
fantasy.content: Choose your quintet. Live the matchday with tension. And get angry when your teammate doesn't score the double penalty that would have put you first in the ranking.

section_por_que.title: Why does PC FUTSAL exist?
section_por_que.paragraph2: Because amateur futsal is pure talent, ordered chaos, locker room, sweat, early mornings, endless trips and real passion.
section_por_que.paragraph3: And because no one was measuring, narrating or organizing it. So we do it. With love, data and some irony along the way.

clasificaciones.title: Clear standings and results
clasificaciones.content: No weird banners, no confusion, no infinite scroll. Everything clean, direct and beautiful (as it should be).

perfiles.title: Player profiles with FIFA style
perfiles.content: With ratings, real statistics, history, attributes and badges. Is it you? Then claim your profile and boost your self-esteem (or lower it, depending on what rivals think).

rankings.title: Rankings that generate debate
rankings.content: The most intense defender. The most unbalanced winger. The most decisive goalkeeper. The "player on the rise". This is going to bring conversations... and we're delighted.

fantasy.title: Real fantasy
fantasy.content: Every week: Your quintet, your points, your medals, your joys... ...and your frustrations.

verificaciones.title: Real verifications
verificaciones.content: Fan â†’ weight 1. Verified player â†’ weight 2. Verified coach â†’ weight 3. Finally a place where the coach rules... but only a little.

memoria.title: Historical memory of futsal
memoria.content: Players and coaches can contribute data from old seasons. What used to stay in a WhatsApp group is now recorded forever.

section_tono.title: Our tone (important)
section_tono.paragraph2: We are not a serious media outlet with ties and offices.
section_tono.paragraph3: We are not a newspaper that puts "emotion" in every headline.
section_tono.paragraph6: With irony, with humor, with sincerity. With respect, without humiliating. With a touch of locker room, but always from love for the sport.

section_futuro.title: And where are we going?
section_futuro.subtitle: To turn PC FUTSAL into:
section_futuro.item1: the national platform of amateur futsal
section_futuro.item2: the largest historical archive of Spanish futsal
section_futuro.item3: the place where everyone wants to look when matches end
section_futuro.item4: the site that will give a boost to the visibility of players and clubs
section_futuro.footer: All without smoke, without posturing and without cheap marketing. Just data, community and passion for this sport.

footer.title: PC FUTSAL
footer.subtitle: Where goals count... and data too.

quienes_somos.meta_title: Who are we? â€” PC FUTSAL
quienes_somos.meta_description: Meet the team behind PC FUTSAL. A project born to give visibility to amateur futsal with data, rankings, fantasy and community.
quienes_somos.title: Who are we?
quienes_somos.spoiler: Spoiler: right now we are fewer people than in a Friday training before a long weekend
quienes_somos.presentation: For now it's me, RubÃ©n Maestre.
quienes_somos.emoji_note: ðŸ™ƒðŸ’¦ (that sweat drop emoji on the face that makes it clear things are fun)
quienes_somos.why_born: PC FUTSAL was born because someone had to do it.
quienes_somos.why_born_detail: Because amateur futsal deserves a proper database, real fantasy, FIFA-style cards, a website that doesn't look like it was made in 2009 and, above all, a place where futsal people have a voice, healthy competition and visibility.
quienes_somos.alone_ecosystem: But of course... an entire ecosystem, just me...
quienes_somos.alone_ecosystem_detail: So there we are, pulling the cart with joy... and a back that's already starting to creak a bit from so much geekiness.

section_que_buscamos.title: What are we looking for?
section_que_buscamos.subtitle: Futsal people who want to contribute:

entrenadores.title: Coaches
entrenadores.content: Who know who has intensity 96, who has dribbling 12 and who should NEVER take a double penalty.

jugadores.title: Players
jugadores.content: Who want to claim their profile, upload their photo and say: "I scored 17 goals that year, don't put 8, please".

directores.title: Sports directors
directores.content: Who know how to say "this one is good, this one is better, and this other one is going to mess things up...".

aficionados.title: Futsal geek fans
aficionados.content: Who enjoy rating players, voting on rankings and debating who is the GOAT of Spanish futsal. Yes, yes, the GOAT. We're going to resolve that issue once and for all... no more of that "This is the Messi of futsal" or "the Cristiano Ronaldo of futsal". No. We're going to find the GOAT of futsal.

cualquiera.title: And anyone who wants to help
cualquiera.content: Because this project is built from within, with people who live futsal every week, not from an office.

section_para_que.title: What do we want help for?

fifa.title: To give FIFA-style ratings to everyone
fifa.content: Who has 64 defense. Who has 92 intensity. Who has 89 dribbling. Who has 76 passing, but thinks they have 99. And with that provoke controversies from all those who get upset about their rating... that also gives life.

fotos.title: To improve profiles and photos
fotos.content: Players, coaches, delegates, clubs... We want profiles to look professional, not photos taken with flash in a hallway of a sports hall or you still showing up with the photo from when you were a cadet and you're already complaining that with the cold your veteran muscles don't warm up the same. Imagine entering a club and seeing: official photos, complete staff, organized squad, real statistics. It would be SPECTACULAR. And it depends on you.

database.title: To build the largest futsal database
database.content: In Spain. And if we go crazy... in the world. Or the known universe, if they let us keep scraping.

section_que_ofrecemos.title: What do we offer in return?
section_que_ofrecemos.no_dinero: No money, because we're like most futsal clubs, humble.
section_que_ofrecemos.no_enganamos: So that's it, we don't deceive: we don't say "yes, yes, we pay you"... and then disappear like certain clubs of unsavory people we all know, yes, you know them too ðŸ˜….

items.colaborador: to appear as a project collaborator
items.ecosistema: to be part of the largest futsal ecosystem in the country
items.influencia: to have real influence on ratings
items.orgullo: and be able to say "I uploaded that" when you see a perfect profile on pcfutsal.es

section_invitacion.title: If you want to help, you're invited

items.mensaje: Or simply send me a message

section_invitacion.footer: Here we do this together, without posturing, without smoke and without weird promises. Real futsal: community, healthy competition and lots of love for this sport.

footer.title: PC FUTSAL
footer.subtitle: Where goals count... and data too.

como_colaborar.meta_title: How to collaborate with PC FUTSAL â€” Join the Project
como_colaborar.meta_description: Discover how to collaborate with PC FUTSAL. Claim your profile, verify your account, contribute data, photos and help build the largest amateur futsal database.
como_colaborar.title: How to collaborate with PC FUTSAL
como_colaborar.subtitle: (or how to become part of the biggest futsal project in the country without sweating a drop... literally)
como_colaborar.intro: PC FUTSAL is building the largest futsal database in Spain:
como_colaborar.intro_items: FIFA-style cards, real rankings, statistics, fantasy game, player ratings, scorer analysis, streaks, history...
como_colaborar.intro_footer: All with attitude, irony and love for real futsal.
como_colaborar.but: But of course... a project like this can't be done by one person alone.
como_colaborar.ruben: RubÃ©n is fine, but he can't be on the court, on the computer, in the sports hall, scraping, making cards and voting for the GOAT of futsal all at the same time.

section_bienvenido.title: Want to help? Welcome to the team (without paying a fee).
section_bienvenido.subtitle: Here you can collaborate in many ways. All equally important.

section_jugador.title: 1) Claim your player profile
section_jugador.intro: If you appear in PC FUTSAL, the first thing is to verify yourself.
section_jugador.subtitle: This way you can:

items.foto: Upload your official photo (for a FIFA card as it should be)
items.archivo: Be an active part of the largest amateur futsal archive

section_jugador.footer: And hey... seeing your card with 87 intensity... that's priceless.

section_entrenador.title: 2) If you're a coach, join as verified
section_entrenador.subtitle: You can:

items.decidir: Decide if a player has 64 defense or 94 (huge responsibility, be careful there)

section_entrenador.footer: If you want to influence the fantasy game and ratings... this is your place.

section_aficionado.title: 3) Futsal fans: you're also important
section_aficionado.intro: If you come to debate who is the GOAT of futsal,
section_aficionado.intro2: if you spend hours looking at statistics,
section_aficionado.intro3: if you love comparing real FIFA cards of neighborhood players...
section_aficionado.subtitle: Then here you can:

items.fantasy: Bet on your favorites in the fantasy game
items.fotos: Send photos or info about clubs that don't appear updated

section_aficionado.footer: You don't need to be an expert. You need to want futsal to grow.

section_fotos.title: 4) Help with photos, data and content
section_fotos.subtitle: If you can contribute:

items.pabellones: Information about sports halls or logos

section_fotos.footer: You'll be part of the largest amateur futsal archive. And seeing a club with its organized squad, its well-done photos and its complete statistics... SPECTACULAR. Really, it shows a lot.

section_correcciones.title: 5) Corrections and contributions from old seasons
section_correcciones.intro: Many players have years of history that no one has recorded.
section_correcciones.subtitle: Here yes.

items.datos: Any missing data that deserves to be in the archive

section_correcciones.footer: We are building the memory of futsal.

section_compartir.title: 6) Share, spread, tease your colleagues
section_compartir.footer1: Every time you do it, you help PC FUTSAL grow.
section_compartir.footer2: And you also tease your teammate to come claim their profile.

section_como_empezar.title: How to get started?
section_como_empezar.subtitle: Very easy:

items.goat: Help us decide who is the GOAT of Spanish futsal

section_como_empezar.footer1: No one gets paid here (like in many clubs... but at least we don't hide it ðŸ˜…).
section_como_empezar.footer2: Here you come to build, to help and to make futsal something bigger.

footer.title: PC FUTSAL
footer.subtitle: Where goals count... and data too.

solicitar_perfil.meta_title: How to request my profile in PC FUTSAL? â€” Claim your FIFA Card
solicitar_perfil.meta_description: Discover how to request and verify your profile in PC FUTSAL. Claim your personalized FIFA card, improve your statistics and participate in the largest amateur futsal database.
solicitar_perfil.title: How to request my profile in PC FUTSAL?
solicitar_perfil.subtitle: (or how to get your own FIFA card without having to sign for BarÃ§a)
solicitar_perfil.intro: If you've come this far, you've probably searched for yourself on Google, seen your name on pcfutsal.es, and said:
solicitar_perfil.quote: "How do I have 72 dribbling? Who put this?"
solicitar_perfil.intro_footer: Here you can claim your profile, verify it and make it as perfect as your first touch (or almost).

section_que_es.title: 1) What is "requesting my profile"?

items.confirmar: Confirming that you are you (because in futsal there are three "JosÃ©s", four "Alex", two "Roberts" and five "Juanfis").
items.modificar: Being able to modify your photo, your history, your position, your seasons, etc.
items.peso: Having more weight in player ratings (yes, your vote is worth more).
items.acceder: Accessing your fully personalized FIFA-style card.
items.participar: Actively participating in the largest futsal database in the country.

section_que_es.footer: And most importantly: prevent your teammate from putting 48 in defense out of revenge.

section_por_que.title: 2) Why claim my profile in PC FUTSAL?
section_por_que.intro: Because if you don't do it... someone else will do it for you.
section_por_que.subtitle: And then things like this happen:

ejemplos.asistencias: You put 35 assists and someone puts 3.
ejemplos.goles: You swear you scored 17 goals and the website says 8.
ejemplos.intensidad: You see yourself as 89 intensity... the website puts 71.
ejemplos.ranking: You consider yourself top-10 in the league... and the ranking puts you on page 3.

section_por_que.subtitle2: Requesting your profile allows you to:

items.tarjeta: Have your FIFA card with a decent photo
items.rankings: Appear correctly in rankings, scorers and scores
items.valoracion: Improve your rating in key attributes (attack, dribbling, intensity, pass, shot, defense...)
items.fantasy: Appear in the real Fantasy Futsal game with your official stats
items.archivo: Be part of the historical archive of amateur futsal

section_por_que.footer: Seriously, who doesn't want to have their real FIFA card?

section_como.title: 3) How to request your profile? (simple mode)
section_como.subtitle: With this info:

items.enlace: Link to your profile on pcfutsal.es (if you've seen it)
items.palmares: And if you want to contribute your achievements, we won't be angry either

section_como.footer1: No need to attach a medical certificate or 1998 federation certificate.

section_que_pasa.title: 4) What happens when you request your profile?

items.revisamos: We review your request (with lots of love and some coffee).
items.marcamos: We mark you as a verified player.
items.voto: Your vote becomes worth more in player ratings.
items.correcciones: You can request corrections from past seasons.
items.mejorar: You can improve your card and your photo.
items.oficial: Your profile becomes official within the PC FUTSAL ecosystem.

section_que_pasa.footer: And if you're a coach or staff, even better: you can assign MVPs and validate data.

section_errores.title: 5) What if I see errors in my profile?
section_errores.subtitle: You are officially invited to:
section_errores.footer: We are building the largest futsal database in Spain, and you can help us make it completely real.

section_cuesta.title: 6) Does it cost money to request my profile?
section_cuesta.footer1: Here we don't charge or pay for these things.
section_cuesta.footer2: Like in real clubs... but at least we don't pretend ðŸ˜….

section_ayudar.title: 7) And can I help with more things?
section_ayudar.subtitle: We always need help with:

items.goat: And, of course, voting to discover who is THE GOAT of Spanish futsal

section_final.title: Request your profile and enter the PC FUTSAL universe
section_final.footer3: And your teammate is already claiming theirs... just in case.

web_club.meta_title: Want a website for your club? â€” Web Design for Futsal Clubs
web_club.meta_description: Create a modern and automatic website for your futsal club. Professional design, real-time data, FIFA cards and automatic content. Clear and adapted budget.
web_club.title: Want a website for your club?
web_club.subtitle: (Because using the sports hall poster as an "official page" no longer works)
web_club.intro: If your futsal club needs a modern, automatic website with real data and a design you can be proud to show... you're in the right place.
web_club.intro2: From the typical "information in a lost PDF" we move to a professional website that works alone while you train.
web_club.intro3: We can create a website as dynamic as PC FUTSAL, or adapted to any style you like: minimalist, classic, modern, vintage, futuristic...
web_club.intro4: Whatever you say, we do it.

section_por_que.title: Why does your club need a real website?
section_por_que.intro: These are the advantages that give you points... even if you don't run the counterattack:

ventaja1.title: 1) More visibility for sponsors
ventaja1.desc1: Your club can show off its image and your sponsors too.
ventaja1.desc2: On your website, their logo is always visible:
ventaja1.desc3: clear, well placed, without pixelation and without hiding it behind a bench.

ventaja2.title: 2) A professional presence (even if you play at 21:45 on weekdays)
ventaja2.desc2: Everything appears automatically and well presented.
ventaja2.desc3: People see order, seriousness and project.

ventaja3.title: 3) Content for social media without breaking your head
ventaja3.desc1: FIFA-style cards, automatic previews, AI-generated reports, rankings, statistics...
ventaja3.desc2: Instead of thinking "what do we upload this week?", you'll have content ready every matchday.

ventaja4.title: 4) Clear information for youth teams and families

items.item4: â€“ how the classification is going
items.item5: â€“ which team is which (very important ðŸ˜…)

ventaja4.desc2: All accessible from mobile in two clicks.

ventaja5.title: 5) A more attractive club for players and coaches
ventaja5.desc1: A serious website gives a good image.
ventaja5.desc2: People want to be in cared-for, visible projects with identity.

section_incluye.title: What your website includes

items.item2: Squad with photos and FIFA-style cards

section_incluye.footer: And, in case it wasn't clear:
section_incluye.footer2: The website updates itself. You don't have to do anything.

section_estilos.title: What styles can you choose?

estilos.estilo9: Or something totally weird that only you understand

section_estilos.footer: Here we design like we play: with freedom and personality.

section_cuanto.title: How much does it cost?
section_cuanto.desc2: No mess, no weird clauses and no promising impossible things.
section_cuanto.desc3: Clear, fair budget adapted to each club.

section_info.title: Want more information?

items.item6: Any idea that comes to mind

section_info.footer2: Faster than a winger going on the counterattack.

section_final.title: Your club deserves a website that lives up to it.
section_final.subtitle: We'll make it for you.

partidos.meta_title: Futsal Matches â€” Results and Calendar
partidos.meta_desc: Check all amateur futsal matches in Spain. Results, calendar and details of each match.
